result.eng: I see a big pile of money in my visions.
result.ga: Feicim carn mór airgid i mo chuid aislingí
result.orig: Feicim carn mór airgid i mo chuid aislingí
result.html: Feicim carn mór airgid i mo chuid aislingíI see a big pile of money in my visions.
result.ponchtml: Feicim carn mór airgid i mo ċuid aislingíI see a big pile of money in my visions.

result.eng: I see myself in the mirror.
result.html: Feicim mé féin sa scáthánI see myself in the mirror.
result.ponchtml: Feicim mé féin sa scáṫánI see myself in the mirror.

result.eng: Oh, I see that my son is crying.
result.ga: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadh
result.orig: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadh
result.html: Ó feicim go bhfuil mo mhac ag caoineadhOh, I see that my son is crying.
result.ponchtml: Ó feicim go ḃfuil mo ṁac ag caoineaḋOh, I see that my son is crying.

result.html: Feicim m'athair go minicI see my father often.
result.ponchtml: Feicim m'aṫair go minicI see my father often.
